name: Winter Climber
description:
4 step Level Design (first mode)
1 just non-moving platform 
2 one threat and moving platform
3 threats and moving platform at the same time
4 bigger threats and moving platform at the same level
(second mode) optional
uses the 4 steps at the same time.
